basic.description: This course focuses on the structure, function, behavior, and evolution of the invertebrate phyla, especially those taxa living in the sea.
basic.subject: ZOO
basic.title: Advanced Invertebrate Zoology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L; and PCB 3034 or PCB 3063 or  ZOO 3713C or instructor permission. Corequisite: ZOO 3205L
